attributes.action: Allow all pupils to repeat the current academic year
attributes.additional_details:
Every parent has a personal story relating to their situation & the majority are fearful & stressed about whether their child has learnt enough to keep moving forward. My son who has ASD started reception the year the pandemic began. He will go in to year 2 this September & I feel so strongly that he has not had enough time; not just academically but also emotionally.  

Parents are struggling to home school & we must consider the mental health of everyone moving forward & do what is right.
attributes.background:
All pupils in the UK should repeat their current academic year to allow a fair progression that is equal for all. 

This is an unprecedented time for everyone, including our leaders. As a parent, I do not think they know what is best for our children. We need to be responsible & ask for more help.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
